      • earLedsSetAngle

        public void earLedsSetAngle(java.lang.Integer param1,
                            java.lang.Float param2,
                            java.lang.Boolean param3)
                     throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        114 earLedsSetAngle Void (Int32,Float,Bool) An animation to show a direction with the ears. degrees: The angle you want to show in degrees (int). 0 is up, 90 is forwards, 180 is down and 270 is back. duration: The duration in seconds of the animation. leaveOnAtEnd: If true the last led is left on at the end of the animation.
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException

        115 fade Void (String,Float,Float) Sets the intensity of a LED or Group of LEDs within a given time. name: The name of the LED or Group. intensity: The intensity of the LED or Group (a value between 0 and 1). duration: The duration of the fade in seconds

                        java.util.List<java.lang.Object> param2,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Object> param3)
                 throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,

        116 fadeListRGB Void (String,Value,Value) Chain a list of color for a device, as the motion.doMove command. name: The name of the LED or Group. rgbList: List of RGB led value, RGB as seen in hexa-decimal: 0x00RRGGBB. timeList: List of time to go to given intensity.
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError

      • fadeRGB

        public void fadeRGB(java.lang.String param1,
                    java.lang.Integer param2,
                    java.lang.Float param3)
             throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        117 fadeRGB Void (String,Int32,Float) Sets the intensity of a led. If the name matches an RGB led, all channels are set to the same value. name: The name of the LED or Group. rgb: The RGB value led, RGB as seen in hexa-decimal: 0x00RRGGBB. duration: Time used to fade in seconds.
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException

           throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        118 reset Void (String) Resets the state of the leds to default (for ex, eye LEDs are white and fully on by default). name: The name of the LED or Group (for now, only "AllLeds" are implemented).
        Throws:
        com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
